XI.iii.1.B.2.e
.
Burial Benefits Payable in Addition to the SC Burial Allowance
In addition to the SC burial allowance, VBA may pay a
plot or interment allowance directly to a State or political subdivision of a State, or tribal organization for burial in a State Veterans cemetery or other cemetery listed in
38 CFR 3.1707(b)
or
38 U.S.C. 2303(b)(1)
, or
transportation benefit related to an eligible Veteran’s burial as described in
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, 1.B.6
.
Note
:  If the Veteran’s death is SC, VA does not pay an additional plot or interment allowance to any individual or estate.  Plot or interment allowance is payable to the State or political subdivision of a State, or tribal organization under
38 U.S.C. 2303(b)(1)
.
